titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bowyear, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, John Sebastian Natter, to Dymock Lyster and George Skipp, at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter covers various subjects:the ongoing situation with the Chaub [Banu Kaâ€˜b] around Basra and the desire for peace;the state of the Carmenia wool trade;details about purchasing silk from Gilan;the news that Sadoo Caun [Sadiq Khan] intends to come down to the coast with an army;the author puts himself forward for a mission to Schirass [Shiraz] to negotiate with the Caun [Karim Khan].
